texts.biography: When Nimbus was a child he had a small dog that eventually died of old age.  Nimbus discovered that by sacrificing a small bird or other creature, he could resurrect his pet, a feat which he repeated each time the dog died.  Little did he realize that he was already exploring the beginnings of Necromancy.
texts.name: Nimbus

specialty.description: Receives a 5% per level bonus to Eagle Eye skill percentage.
specialty.name: Eagle Eye
